Layer.NewSongWarningCommand: %function(self) if TestMode then self:sleep(100000000) else SCREENMAN:SetNewScreen('ScreenNewSongs') end end
Layer.SendToTitleScreenCommand: %function(self) if TestMode then self:sleep(100000000000) else SCREENMAN:SetNewScreen('ScreenTitleMenu') end end

Layer.UpdateSongsCommand: %function(self) local DWI_songlist = SONGMAN:GetAllSongs() local Profile = PROFILEMAN:GetMachineProfile():GetSaved() if DWI_slwalk >= table.getn(DWI_songlist) then self:settext('(done)'); if table.getn( DWI_songlist ) > Profile.DWISongs then self:sleep(0.25) self:queuecommand('NewSongWarning') else self:sleep(0.25) self:queuecommand('SendToTitleScreen') end else self:settext('' ..DWI_GroupName(DWI_songlist[DWI_slwalk]).. '/' ..DWI_songlist[DWI_slwalk]:GetDisplayMainTitle() ); DWI_slwalk = DWI_slwalk + 6; self:sleep( 0.01 + ( math.random(60,300) / 1000 ) ); self:queuecommand('UpdateSongs'); end end

Layer.UpdateBarCommand: %function(self) local DWI_songlist = SONGMAN:GetAllSongs() if DWI_slwalk >= table.getn(DWI_songlist) then self:cropright(0) else self:cropright( ( table.getn(DWI_songlist) - (DWI_slwalk) ) / table.getn(DWI_songlist) ) end self:sleep( 0.01 + ( math.random(60,300) / 1000 ) ); self:queuecommand('UpdateBar') end

Layer.HardwareCommand: %function(self) self:settext('Analizing folders and song contents'); self:sleep(0.8); self:queuecommand('UpdateSongs') end
Layer.UpdateSongsCommand: %function(self) local DWI_songlist = SONGMAN:GetAllSongs() local Profile = PROFILEMAN:GetMachineProfile():GetSaved() if DWI_slwalk >= table.getn(DWI_songlist) then self:settext( table.getn(DWI_songlist) ..' / '.. table.getn(DWI_songlist) ); if table.getn( DWI_songlist ) > Profile.DWISongs then self:sleep(0.25) self:queuecommand('NewSongWarning') else self:sleep(0.25) self:queuecommand('SendToTitleScreen') end else self:settext( DWI_slwalk ..' / '.. table.getn(DWI_songlist) ); DWI_slwalk = DWI_slwalk + 6; self:sleep( 0.01 + ( math.random(60,300) / 1000 ) ); self:queuecommand('UpdateSongs'); end end

%function(self) self:x(SCREEN_RIGHT-15) self:y(SCREEN_BOTTOM-15) self:horizalign('right') self:vertalign('bottom') self:zoom(0.4); self:diffuse(0.5,0.5,0.5,1) if FUCK_EXE then self:settext( 'DWI - NotITG Version
V'.. DWIVersion() ..' - '.. DWIVerDate() ) self:diffuse(0.5,0.75,0.5,1) elseif OPENITG then self:settext( 'DWI - OpenITG Version
V'.. DWIVersion() ..' - '.. DWIVerDate() ) self:diffuse(0.75,0.5,0.5,1) else self:settext( 'DWI - SM (UNSTABLE) Version
V'.. DWIVersion() ..' - '.. DWIVerDate() ) self:diffuse(0.5,0.5,0.5,1) end end

%function(self) self:x(SCREEN_LEFT+15) self:y(SCREEN_BOTTOM-15) self:horizalign('left') self:vertalign('bottom') self:zoom(0.4); self:diffuse(0,0,0,0) if TestMode then self:diffuse(1,0.5,0.5,1) self:settext( 'TEST MODE ENABLED\nScreen Will NOT Change until Test Mode is disabled.' ) end end
